lines.text: Since the beginning of Time the Horse has been Man's loyal friend... But Man has not always been the Friend the Horse has to Man...
Mr. Rellece, you like to make believe you ain't got no heart for horses, but I knows you. You loves that little colt.
Oh, quit your gabbin'. Did I ever say I was gonna sell 'im?
No, sir, you sure did not, and if ever you did, I ain't ever heard yuh.
I could be crazy about you, Ruby.
I could like you too, Rick, but we'd be crazy if we did. The cards are stacked against us,
Yeah, I guess we need a new deal.

[Seeing Ruby taking a drink out of a flask in the back of Scanlon's limo]
Aw, don't do that, Ruby!
I hate to see anyone hit the hootch the way you do.
You don't know how bad I need this drink.
It is for what ails me.
Well, let me tell you something. Don't get too high on a horse. They'll disappoint you.
Tommy couldn't disappoint as much as some men have.
